panels.description:
Shows the grouped memory usage of alloc, frees and sys.

Sys is the total bytes of memory obtained from the OS.

Frees is the cumulative count of heap objects freed.

Alloc is bytes of allocated heap objects.
panels.title: Runtime Memory Stats

panels.description: Shows the grouped heap memory usage.
panels.title: Runtime Memory Heap
